title: TM464: Apply Audit Opt-Out Grade Spreading After Review
description:
14 students opted to drop Skill-Environment Audit 1 and have Audit 2 count for 15%.

**Pending:** Review Audit 2 grades via grade-review.html interface first, then re-run apply_audit_opt_out.py to spread calibrated scores.

**Students:** Andy Quach, Justin Hill-Kocak, Christina Hefan Cui, Kilee Knutson, Sam Rappoport, Mikey Luk, Aishwarya Nandkishorji Mundada, Patrick Norton, Victoria Kao, Nicolla Eddy Wopara, Adailton Nali, Ziang Zhu, Yun-Pei Wei, Maximilian Lemos

**Files:** projects/grading-experiment-2025/apply_audit_opt_out.py, projects/grading-experiment-2025/PENDING_TASKS.md

**After review:** python3 apply_audit_opt_out.py â†’ upload CSV to Canvas

title: TM464: Manual Grade - chensiding & sunyang Action Memo
description:
Two students have ERROR ratings for Action Memo Strategic Quality criterion (all LLM runs failed JSON parsing):
- chensiding: 0/20 on Action Memo
- sunyang: 0/20 on Action Memo

These need manual grading. Filter by 'Grading Error' in grade-review.html to find them.

**Context:** skill_audit_2 grading session 26, rubric in rubrics/skill_audit_2.json
